name: Lost In The Stars (Lamperr)
description:
This game / interactive learning experience was made for the T9  hackathon 2023

All the art work seen was done by our team

DevPost and GitHub are linked if you want to read more

https://devpost.com/software/lost-in-the-stars

https://github.com/Lamperr/LostInTheStars

Basic movement combined with learning Chinese Constellations

Make sure you can alt tab or quit out of the game if you do want to check it out as there is not a minimize screen feature.

Apologies if you cannot get it to run!

Thanks,

-NL4
